mapper.insert: insert into db_purchaseflow_log (SEQUENCEID, FLOWSID, DEVELOPSID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, STOCKPRICE, CREATEDATE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, OPER, OPERTYPE, GROUPID, 'STATUS', LCLSID, CONTENT ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{developsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lclsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update db_purchaseflow_log set FLOWSID = #{flowsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEVELOPSID = #{developsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STOCKPRICE = #{stockprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LCLSID = #{lclsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, FLOWSID, DEVELOPSID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, STOCKPRICE, CREATEDATE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, OPER, OPERTYPE, GROUPID, 'STATUS', LCLSID, CONTENT from db_purchaseflow_log where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, FLOWSID, DEVELOPSID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, STOCKPRICE, CREATEDATE, CREATEOPER, OPERTIME, OPER, OPERTYPE, GROUPID, 'STATUS', LCLSID, CONTENT from db_purchaseflow_log
